name: @pomegranate/plugin-facade
description: The internal plugin interface for the Pomegranate framework.

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test FORCE_COLOR=1 tap -R spec --cov test/unit/*.js test/unit/**/*.js test/integration/**/*.js
scripts.test:report: NODE_ENV=test FORCE_COLOR=1 tap -R spec --cov --coverage-report=lcov test/unit/**/*.js test/integration/**/*.js

author: Jim Bulkowski <jim.b@paperelectron.com> (http://paperelectron.com)
